info.title: Argovis API
info.description: REST API for Argo profiles, platforms, selections, BGC data, gridded products, etc.

servers.description: Server Hosted by University of Colorado, Boulder
Local server for testing and development

tags.name: grid
tags.description: Gridded products derived from Argo floats, simulation, or satalite product

tags.name: profiles
tags.description: Profile data, including BGC and profile metadata

tags.name: dacs
tags.description: Summary and metadata for data assembly centers represented in the dataset

get.summary: Find and filter atmo river shapes.
Probability distribution field for a float at point lat-lon after forcastDays.
Sum of probability distribution field over a region for a float starting at point lat-lon after forcastDays.
returns a list of tropical cyclone names and years
metadata from grid unique dates, pres levels
uniformly spaced rectangular gridded product selector
non uniformly spaced rectangular gridded product
returns a single grid by name
Search, reduce and download profile data.
List profile IDs that match a search
Provides a summary of the profile database.
Provides metadata for a specified platform.
Provides a list of platforms (all by default) with their most recent known report and position.
Lists all platforms that report BGC data.
Summary data for all DACs in the database.

ancestorGrid.description: ancestor object describing common grid-like properties

nonUniformGrid.description: response object for non-uniform grid search

arDate.name: date
arDate.description: three hour increments starting at 2004-01-01T00:00:00 and ending at 2017-04-02T03:00:00

arID.name: _id
arID.description: ID of an atmospheric river object

startDate.name: startDate
startDate.description: date-time formatted string indicating the beginning of a time period

endDate.name: endDate
endDate.description: date-time formatted string indicating the end of a time period

dateUniform.name: date
dateUniform.description: YYYY-MM-DD format. Monthly grids use the first day of the month.

dateNonUniform.name: date
dateNonUniform.description: YYYY-MM-DD format. Monthly grids use the first day of the month.

polygon.name: polygon
polygon.description: array of [lon, lat] vertices describing a polygon; final point must match initial point

box.name: box
box.description: box described as [[lower left lon, lower left lat], [upper right lon, upper right lat]]

center.name: center
center.description: center to measure max radius from

forcastDays.name: forcastDays
forcastDays.description: number of days over which to project Argo float drift
